text:
:wave: <@U018NST5B8R>, for your immediate questions:
1. This is being pulled from your RSS feed on the WP site (<https://poppinpay.com/feed/>). I would refer to this page for how to go about customizing this: <https://codex.wordpress.org/Customizing_Feeds>
2. Let me loop in with some internal folks on this. 
Other questions:
1. The RSS Listing module as described in the post is actually a “tag” located here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#rss-listing> (I update’d the post with a proper link).

<@U2H3TT8F2>, awesome. my client will be so happy as I just received back a note "yeah we def need that featured image."  I sooooo appreciate your links and any help. FYI client has two accounts with HS (different businesses) so I want to keep him happy with the tool.
